DOC.brief_summary: This post market , prospective , comparison study use FloShield Air System versus Clearify™ Visualization System ( D-HELP ) laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison FloShield Air System Versus Clearify Visualization System ( D-HELP )
DOC.detailed_description: This post market , prospective , comparison study use FloShield Air System versus Clearify™ Visualization System ( D-HELP ) laparoscopic surgery . The study randomize across two group , one group evaluate laparoscopic lens clean D-HELP laparoscopic surgery second group evaluate laparoscopic lens clean use FloShield Air System laparoscopic surgery . Each surgery capture video . Study parameter evaluate review video independent evaluator .
DOC.criteria: Female Male ; 18 year age old ; Patient schedule gastrointestinal , gynecologic , urologic bariatric laparoscopic surgery care study investigator ; Suitable candidate surgery Unfit surgery : concomitant disorder incompatible study surgery ( discretion investigator ) ; Use Surgiquest AirSeal® ; Use humidify insufflation
